metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8399 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The default configuration in systemd-shim 8 enables the Abandon debugging clause, which allows local users to cause a denial of service via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8399` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

systemd-shim - 6-2bzr1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> systemd-shim 8-4 in vivid no longer ships the dbus policy

criterions.comment: systemd-shim package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6-2bzr1').
